NAME: ban
DESCRIPTION: Ban an user from the server.
OPTIONS_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user to ban from the server.
OPTIONS_DELETE_DAYS_DESCRIPTION: The number of days to delete messages for. (0-7)
OPTIONS_NOTIFY_DESCRIPTION: Whether to notify the user of the ban.
OPTIONS_VISIBLE_DESCRIPTION: Whether to show the ban in the channel.
BANNED: **An user has been banned from the server.**
PERMISSIONS: The user you want to ban either have a higher role than you or the bot doesn't have the permissions to ban them.
ALREADY_BANNED: The user is already banned from the server.
